articles.author: Chris Goldstein
articles.title: Millennials bear the brunt of Pa. marijuana arrests - Philly
articles.description: Philadelphia is evolving into a safe haven for cannabis consumers even as arrests increase across Pennsylvania. Newly-elected District Attorney Larry Krasner announced Thursday that he would drop any marijuana possession cases brought to the court by police.
